long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Modern exchange app, next gen currency converter extension!

üìÑ Description:
  QuickCConverter is your ultimate companion for seamless and real-time currency conversion directly within your Chrome browser. Stay on top of exchange rates, effortlessly convert currencies, and make informed financial decisions, all with the convenience of a quick and reliable extension.

‚ú® How to Use:
  1. Install QuickCConverter from the Chrome Web Store.
  2. Click on the extension icon in your browser or use keyboard shortcut.
  3. Select the source and target currencies for conversion.
  4. Instantly view accurate and up-to-date conversion results!

‚ö°Ô∏èFeatures:
  ‚û°Ô∏è Real-time exchange rates: Stay informed with the latest currency values
  ‚û°Ô∏è Can work offline. Currency list is auto-updating every 30 min
  ‚û°Ô∏è Support for 100+ currencies: Covering a wide range of international currencies
  ‚û°Ô∏è Open extension in window mode, like a native app
  ‚û°Ô∏è Supported 16 languages
  ‚û°Ô∏è One to one currency converter or multiple live currency converter
  ‚û°Ô∏è Auto-save last selected currency
  ‚û°Ô∏è Auto-save last currency value(s)
  ‚û°Ô∏è Format customization, digits, decimal and more
  ‚û°Ô∏è Easy-to-use interface: Effortlessly convert currencies with a user-friendly design
  ‚û°Ô∏è No ADS, clicks, video-ads, clear and minimal UI design

üöÄ Release notes:
  v.3.0.8:
  ‚úÖ Fixed API currency update.

  v.3.0.7:
  ‚úÖ Added UAH symbol (‚Ç¥) for On-page converter feature.

  ‚úÖ Bug fixes and improvements

  ‚úÖ UI/UX Improvements
  ‚úÖ Added "Buy Me A Coffee" button, users now can support usüòó
  ‚úÖ Added new translations
  ‚úÖ Bug fixes and improvements

  v.3.0.3:
  ‚úÖ Added 16 more currencies
  ‚úÖ Select to convert feature now is enabled by default

  v.3.0:
  ‚úÖ Extension redesign
  ‚úÖ Rewrites all code from vanilla to Vue.js
  ‚úÖ Added possibility to change digits, decimals, separator
  ‚úÖ Added Bitcoin currency
  ‚úÖ Added new language - Chinese
  ‚úÖ Translation improvements
  ‚úÖ Extension speed improvement

  v.2.0.6:
  ‚úÖ Added possibility to convert currency by selecting text on pages. How it work?
  You just need to select value (for example 100 USD), and extension automatically will convert your value to your currency value (from "one currency" tab in popup window (last currency)).
  Works for main currency list.
  ‚úÖ Fixed last update issue
  ‚úÖ Translation improvements
  ‚úÖ Extension speed improvement

  v.1.0.5:
  ‚úÖ Added possibility to refresh manually currency list
  ‚úÖ Translation improvements

  v.1.0.4:
  ‚úÖ Extension speed improvement

  v.1.0.3:
  ‚úÖ Added search input, now you can search faster your currency
  ‚úÖ Four currencies values are also stocked in local storage
  ‚úÖ New extension icon, more useful and obvious
  ‚úÖ Translation improvements

  v.1.0.0
  ‚úÖ Initial Release
